column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Meredith - Thanks for our review
column2: though I can understand your frustration with our parking garage attendants. At present
column3: there is major ongoing construction in the garage
column4: which has affected their normal operations immensely. Needless to say
column5: the pressure and stress has increased considerably since construction began
column6: especially since the garage is used by four different restaurants. Regardless
column7: I'm pleased to know you enjoyed our ramen
column8: and I hope upon your next visit
column9: you don't have to go through the same parking ordeal.
